title: i remember season 4 I could play Volibear top, jungle, and support
body:
now he's turned into only being a C-tier jungler 

I guess Zilean got what he wanted {{item:3070}} {{champion:106}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I miss {{champion:203}} {{item:3070}}
tfw forgotten champs {{item:3070}}

{{champion:266}} He's so weak yet is so new and riot neve-oh wait.

{{champion:3}} Poor dude has such outdated abilities and is never played, if only riot woul-oh wait.

{{champion:6}} He, how much he sucks, and his playrate are all memes, riot shou-oh wait.

{{champion:28}} Looks like something from season 1/2, i wonder when riot wil-oh wait.

{{champion:19}} He literally hasn't changed AT ALL since alpha, when will he finally get a rewo-oh wait.

Aatrox is getting some nice buffs next patch
The new champion teased is 99% Galio's Rework
Urgot is up next after Galio
Evelynn is up for VGU
Warwick is being played in Korean Challenger level.

However the champions I have mentioned, Riot Games have no plans for them at all.

My original post was sarcasm, as to why i put "-oh wait" at the end.

But your post makes me think that this is double sarcasm, something you don't see very often, so i'm not sure if it is double sarcasm or not.

EDIT: just by looking at the upvotes of my first "oh wait" post makes me think people are taking it seriously.
if by buffs you mean lowering of numbers on every skill and passive now has to be completely full to to revive you then yes buffs

> The new champion teased is 99% Galio's Rework
(Hopefully I quoted that correctly lol) How has this been teased? I haven't seen anything, but I'm also not the most up-to-date on things I guess.
Eve is after Urgot if I'm not mistaken. Will take her the team that's working on Galio atm.

> [{quoted}](name=DaNinad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GV5kv5jX,comment-id=00000001000000000001,timestamp=2017-03-04T19:40:01.846+0000)

it was a minion skin from an old Halloween i think...
that's omen
fiddles aint supposed to excel here. this meta is Pre-6 gank or you can't jungle.
People don't like Mundo's new lore?

Liss is still quite okay. Falls behind other mages, but she can still be quite decent I feel. She's the mage I fall back to when I'm mid or we need some AP top.

Fiddle and Mundo are just really sad to watch.
If you really want to try Fiddle you need to start wolves and then double pull blue + gromp. Otherwise you'll ´have fallen behind the enemy jungler already :/

> [{quoted}](name=AmazoX,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GV5kv5jX,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-03-04T17:51:37.833+0000)
>
> What about {{champion:127}}. High Mana Costs, Rough time compared to all the other mages, A passive only useful during laning phase.{{item:3070}} 
> 
> Or
> 
>  {{champion:9}} He is supposed to excel in this Meta but yet struggles in the updated jungle. {{item:3070}}  
> 
> {{champion:36}} Poor guy has infinite counters and is a walking meat body. {{item:3070}} 
> His lore recently got updated and majority of people do not like it as much as the old lore..

lissandra isn't really supposed to compete with other mages well, her kit is geared towards initiation and being anti-assassin
{{champion:127}} passive useful? That's an oxymoron xD
member Kindred adc
You still can in bronze. Volibear ALWAYS gets fed in bronze.
FEEL MY PAIN {{champion:90}}

{{champion:76}} 
Try harder.
{{champion:163}} Sorry, what?

Yours doesn't work. There's never been a point where Taliyah was any good. 
Foxplosion's barely works because Malz was viable AD in the jungle a little while ago. 

But there hasn't been a champion more versatile than Nidalee used to be who is also no longer relevant in any role.

Um yes it does, she got nerfed heavily because of how much of a lane bully she was.
Upon release she was brokeeeeeeeeeeeeeeen

The point isn't how strong they were in one lane. (And Taliyah wasn't broken on release, she was just NEW on release, so people didn't have practice against her)

OP was complaining that Voli used to be viable everywhere. Likewise, Nidalee used to be too. Taliyah has never been good anywhere, and only reasonably playable in mid.
LCS-tier*

Niche pick is nothing but a devour bot

and you think him being pigeonholed into a one-trick pony is an okay tradeoff for a shity top and loss of jungle?

"One-trick pony" is very misleading in this context - most champions are played in only one position.
With that being said I am pretty sure that he is still amazing top in certain matchups (Riven for example can't do shit) - on top of being a common pick in professional play in every region.
Seeing how he was originally intended to be a support T'K is in an amazing play, although not many people play him (which is to be expected seeing how not commonly good looking champions with non-flashy gameplay are very unpopular - see Galio who is a monster in soloQ).

He was originally intended to be a support AND  top laner people are so thick-headed

Riven can beat a Tahm in the same way that she has no bad matchups if you are good at her because of how bullshit she is

Sure, but they said that they focused on support in the later stages of development so if support is strong enough for LCS and toplane still performs [decently ](http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/de/champions/stats/tahmkench/top) (watch the winrate/games played, it's better than Riven across the board)..

That's just wrong. Yes, matchups change depending on the elo, but there are still very bad matchups for Riven. I don't know about Challenger, but I know several dia Riven players who are very frustrated with T'K.

i'm doing pretty ok with him top, last couple games

I'm 1/3 right now but that's because these asshole teammates keep using all their mobility to keep me from saving them 

(see my other thread for context)
Yeah, why is voli so bad in this meta, I mean in my eyes he's an indestructible wall with flaming spikes.
Voli could probably use a small-scale rework. What class is that guy? Juggernaut?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/7ZFjOwKh-low-scope-volibear-rework-idea

I made a thread about him getting reworked a couple days ago, something small enough to make him feel better to play
The W should just have its static cooldown, remove the 3-hit requirement, and have the AS increase per rank. That'd be a massive QoL buff.
Yeah, it feels really bad to just run and then do pretty much nothing meaningful.

Voli was my first ever jungler.

Honestly he's fine in the Jungle but hes trash in Top lane
He's a jungler who requires the laners have some form of hard CC so he can actually reach them for the flip.

i predict voli winrate will go up when we see nerfs to the current fuckface junglers

but ya it's kind of sad how him and shyv havent been playable top for ages

I still think you can play him top very well. He's a pretty big lane bully especially since you can get minion advantage easily by flipping people into the minion wave. I'm not a Volibear player though, so my experience is only against Volibear, not as Volibear.
Volibear support is a very specialized thing. I still think you can play him support, but it's not very effective unless you're in the right situation. (I'm not sure what that "right" situation is. I'm guessing that a short ranged marksman to go with Volibear, an immobile enemy marksman, and an enemy tank support would be a good bot lane situation for Volibear support.) I don't think it has ever been "good," just all right.

He can't be played top well at all. All he has are his flip and passive, really, and anyone can either out-damage, out-cc him, or both.
Heck, with Ghost Darius becomes a much better Volibear.
To be honest, support Volibear has always been a Bronze thing.
{{item:3165}} being every mages first item and {{item:3123}} being easy to buy killed voli.
A bear doesn't belong in League.

I mean, I remember Cho was a viable top, mid and jg... Now he's literally the worst jungler, a shitty midlaner, and a terrible toplaner. And he likely won't be touched after this last round of ~~nerfs~~ buffs.
Riot already said they will likely buff Cho soon.
Granted you could play almost any tank as support in s3 and s4. I was a {{champion:113}} support 1 trick in s3 and it smashed most of the time.

So me and my friend made Volivear work in ranked botlane. Him and Singed botlane! W Target as singed, Voli jumps em, singed flips them again. And death ensues!!! :D
(It actually worked due to just being able to nope outa lane if ganked!)
and thank fucking god
